description: Find Jack Mini is a free version of Find Jack, a fun shell game with a hungry little ant named Jack.  Jack will hide under one of several cups and they will spin round and round. Try to keep track of the correct cup while Jack and his friends do their best to distract you. Features include a Slow Mo Replay function, High Scores, and funny bugs who try to help Jack hide from you.  Simple and fun – enjoy the game.   This free version limits the score to 12 correct picks.  The full version has no limit to the score, additional bugs, surprises, and tricks.
